espresso-express.fullDescription: In Espresso Express, you step into the shoes of a rookie barista tasked with managing the busiest coffee stall in the Grand Junction Station. As locomotives roar past, you must balance brewing complexity, customer patience, and limited resources. Upgrade your grinders, discover secret bean blends, and unlock a heartwarming story about the commuters who pass through every day.

updates.title: The Holiday Roast
changes: Added festive decorations to the station
Fixed a bug where the espresso machine would stop steaming during rush hour
Optimized loading times for mobile devices

updates.title: Balance & Beans
changes: Added new character: The Grumpy Conductor

moose-mysteries.fullDescription: The pines hold secrets, and Detective Antlers is the only one who can sniff them out. Moose Mysteries is a point-and-click adventure game blending classic noir atmosphere with quirky woodland humor. Explore hand-drawn environments, gather clues from local wildlife, and solve the mystery of the Missing Maple Syrup. Every choice you make impacts the forest ecosystem.

updates.title: Forest expansion
changes: Opened the 'Maple Grove' area for exploration
Implemented a new dialogue system with wildlife
Visual overhaul of the inventory UI

Bean Counter is a deck-building roguelike where your combat power is determined by your economic prowess. Play your cards right to invest in futures, dodge taxes from the Caffeine King, and build a trading empire from a single burlap sack.

updates.title: Initial Brew
changes: 3 starter bean classes added (Light, Medium, Dark Roast)
